content:
The President of Ukraine held a meeting with the delegation of the political group of the European Parliament Renew Europe headed by President of the group Valérie Aye.

About thisIt is saidon the website of the President of Ukraine, ArmyInform reports.

Volodymyr Zelenskyy thanked the European Parliament for its strong support for Ukraine and the Ukrainian people.

“Thank you for your visit and significant support from the members of the European Parliament throughout the years of Russia's war against Ukraine, as well as for significant resolutions in support of Ukraine and Ukrainians. Your visit is a very important signal for our people and the whole world that Ukraine is part of Europe, and Europe is aware that Ukraine is a protective shield for our common values, ”the President said.

During the meeting, the parties elaborated on the issue of accelerating the provision of military assistance to Ukraine by European capitals.

The interlocutors paid special attention to the European integration of Ukraine. Volodymyr Zelensky emphasized the need to start the negotiation process during the Belgian presidency in the EU Council in June this year.

“Ukraine has implemented all four recommendations of the European Commission, defined in the annual expansion package. All important laws are voted, which is a difficult issue during a full -scale war. But Ukraine is determined to maintain a high rate of integration into the European Union, as it is a foreign policy priority of our country, as well as an integral part of Ukraine's security and the entire European space, ”Volodymyr Zelenskyy said.

The parties also exchanged views on the influence and possible ways of counteracting Russian propaganda in Europe, as well as all types of modern hybrid attacks that the Russian Federation is actively using the Russian Federation.

Earlier the Armyinformreportedthat Volodymyr Zelenskyy told the speaker of the US House of Representatives about Russian bombardment.
title: The Head of State discussed with the delegation of the European Parliament group accelerating assistance to Ukraine
description: This is stated on the website of the President of Ukraine, reports the Armyinform. Volodymyr Zelenskyy ...
author: Army Inform
